title: BBC Local Live: Essex Wednesday, 9 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: essex fire and rescue service says an exploding aerosol can destroyed part of a bungalow in walton-on-the-naze last night .
stagecoach pulls out of a joint bid with abellio to run the 2017 greater anglia franchise .
a southend fraudster who posed as the 12th duke of marlborough and racked up hotel bills of almost £ 12,000 is jailed .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for essex have finished for the day but we 'll be back from 08:00 on thursday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel .

documents.title: weather : more cloud than last night but staying dry
text: another windy night is expected with more cloud than last night , although brief clear spells are also likely .
all parts should remain dry and it will be much milder than last night .
minimum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
tomorrow , rain will spread from the northwest across all areas by mid-morning , perhaps turning rather heavy in places .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: colchester united chairman takes your questions
text: got a burning question you want to put to the chairman of colchester united ?
tonight is your night as robbie cowling will be joining bbc essex 's dave monk taking your calls from 18:00 .
you can get your question in by calling the studio on 0300 200 40 41 .
author: Gavin Fischer
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : walton bungalow blast death fears and 'fake duke ' jailed
text: here are your top stories for essex :
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: ukip councillor calls trump comments 'ill-judged '
text: comments made by a conservative councillor who tweeted that us presidential hopeful donald trump was `` probably correct '' to call for a ban on muslims entering the us were `` ill-judged '' , it has been claimed .
ukip essex county councillor jamie huntman ( said : `` you have to think before you speak , or tweet .
as soon you put it out there it 's for everybody to see '' .
bill sharp , a tory councillor at castle point borough council who angered some twitter users , told me he did n't intend to cause offence but he 'll not be retracting his remarks .
author: Gavin Fischer
BBC Essex

documents.title: elderly woman robbed of sentimental items
text: an elderly woman has had her handbag containing sentimental letters and photographs snatched in witham .
the 74-year-old was walking with her husband on speedwell close on sunday when the suspect ran up behind them and took the bag , police say .
a three figure sum of cash was inside , along with a photographs of the victim 's grandchildren .
you can read a description of the suspect on essex police 's facebook page .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: empty taxi rolls into timber-framed home
text: council tenants in dovercourt received and unexpected visitor in the shape of a runaway taxi which ended up in the front wall of their home .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: items savalged from bungalow explosion
text: the son of an elderly man whose bungalow was destroyed in an explosion yesterday has returned to the site .
john charles-mann managed to salvage a few items including a certificate his father won at a dog show .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: your a winter in full blossom
text: i 'm sure you 've noticed that so far december has been a lot warmer than usual , in fact it has been so mild even the trees are getting confused .
nick oxton sent us this of a cherry tree in colchester that is in full blossom !
share your photos with us by email or facebook .

documents.title: aerosol explosion bungalow clean-up
text: i 'm in walton-on-the-naze where contractors have begun securing an elderly man 's bungalow after it was destroyed in an explosion last night .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: 'fake duke ' and other impostor aristocrats
text: alexander wood ( right ) from southend , who posed as the duke of marlborough , ( left ) to con luxury hotels is certainly not the first high-profile conman to adopt an aristocratic alter-ego .
in 1495 , perkin warbeck claimed to be the duke of york and went on to lead an unsuccessful rebellion against king henry vii .
he was hanged .

while last year a facebook user posing as prince harry conned an austrian floor fitter out of 27,500 euros ( £ 23,000 ) offering him a million-euro contract to renovate the parquet flooring at buckingham palace .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: travel : two lanes closed in dartford tunnel
text: two lanes are closed in the m25 dartford tunnel due to a three-vehicle accident .
the east tunnel is closed while the accident is cleared .
the west bore tunnel is also being held intermittently to released trapped traffic .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : a little cloudier this afternoon with winds increasing
text: as we go through this afternoon , cloud amounts will increase and it will turn milder despite the strengthening winds .
there will still be plenty of brightness .
maximum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: fake duke 'stayed in hotels out of fear '
text: a southend man who posed as the 12th duke of marlboroughto defraud hotels claimed he `` feared for his life '' and could not return home after telling police about a wanted man .
sentencing alexander wood , 34 at southwark crown court , judge alistair mccreath , said : `` i do not accept his decision to stay in hotels had anything to do with being under threat from anybody .
the explanation is one of simple greed . ''
wood was jailed for three-and-a-half years after admitting 13 counts of fraud by false representation .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: hopeless christmas trees spreading more chuckles than cheer
text: after vandals cut down a christmas tree in rochford , i 've been looking at festive offerings around the country which have left people feeling less than merry .
from a tree that leans `` more than the tower in pisa '' in beeston to a stockton heath christmas tree was likened to a twig .
author: Helen Carter
Reporter, BBC News Online

documents.title: abellio 'relaxed ' about stagecoach withdrawal from joint bid to run trains
text: abellio says it 'll continue to bid on its own after stagecoach pulled out of a joint deal .
final bids to run rail services across east anglia have to be submitted by next week .

national express and first group have also been shortlisted but the abellio/stagecoach bid was seen in political circles as being the favourite because stagecoach has a good reputation and a lot of money .
author: Andrew Sinclair
BBC Look East political correspondent

documents.title: alleyway sex assault investigated
text: police have cordoned off an alleyway in clacton after a woman reported being attacked yesterday afternoon
the victim told officers she was sexually assaulted between dudley road and agincourt road around 13:30 .
her attacker is described as white , in his 40s , 5ft 4in ( 1.6m ) tall , and spoke with a north american accent .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: only the fittest cockroaches find a mate , essex study finds
text: when it comes to finding a mate in the animal world you would think cockroaches would be the least but essex research has found that is n't the case .
male cuban burrowing cockroaches perform a wing-raising '' ritual to attract a female , which involves the repeated vertical flaring and lowering of their wings .
but scientists at anglia ruskin university found the males that produced the most energetic displays were more likely to attract a female .

documents.title: headlines : duke of marlborough jailed and stagecoach pulls out of rail franchise bid
text: here are the top stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: abellio to press ahead with bid to run east anglia trains
text: i understand that abellio intends to continue with its bid to run the east anglia franchise on its own after stagecoach pulled out of a joint deal .
the company says it has enough money to operate the service as a single venture .
author: Andrew Sinclair
BBC Look East political correspondent

documents.title: duke of marlborough impersonator jailed
text: a southend fraudster who posed as the 12th duke of marlborough and racked up hotel bills of almost £ 12,000 has been sentenced to three and a half years in prison .
southwark crown court heard alexander wood , 34 , defrauded six top london hotels including claridges in mayfair from february to july this year .
wearing blue jeans and a white and blue striped shirt wood ( motionless as the sentences were handed down .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: walton bungalow explosion : 'my dad was sitting in his chair with his hair on fire '
text: the son of a pensioner whose home was destroyed by an aerosol can explosion yesterday says he thought his father `` was dead '' .
crews were called to elliots drive in walton-on-the-naze around 19:30 last night .
`` i could see right inside the house , the roof was on the ground and my dad was just sitting there i realised he was alive , but it was horrific , '' son john charles-mann told me .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: stagecoach wo n't pursue deal with abellio for east anglia franchise
text: stagecoach has announced it will not be putting a joint bid to run the east anglia line with abellio greater anglia .
the firm announced the news a short while ago .

taking account of the other rail bidding opportunities that we anticipate over the next two years , we have decided not to proceed with an equity participation in the bid for the new east anglia franchise . ''
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: stagecoach pulls out of joint bid run 2017 greater anglia franchise
text: stagecoach has pulled out of joint bid with abellio to run the 2017 greater anglia franchise , the bbc has learned .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: lunchbox bomb scare contents revealed
text: in case you were interested , we now know what was in the lunch box which caused a security alert on a bus in chelmsford this morning :
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: inside the destroyed walton bungalow
text: more have emerged of the bungalow which was partially destroyed in walton-on-the-naze by an aerosol can .
incredibly , paramedics say a man in his 80s `` seemed ok '' following the canister explosion last night which wiped out an entire corner of the wall .

documents.title: aerosol can destroys bungalow
text: more details have arisen from the explosion which destroyed part of a bungalow in walton-on-the-naze .
essex fire and rescue says an aerosol lighter re-fill canister caught fire and exploded `` with enough force to take out an entire corner of the wall '' .
a man in his 80s was taken to colchester hospital following the explosion on elliots drive .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: flowers laid at fatal waltham abbey shooting site
text: flowers have been laid close to the site where a man died after a fatal shooting in waltham abbey yesterday .
essex police says it is working with ballistic experts as it continues its investigation .
the marriott hotel and the volunteer pub have returned to normal business .
we 're told both m25 slip roads at j26 have reopened , however honey lane will remain closed between the two roundabouts .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: charity fundraisers subject to new rules
text: colchester has become the fourth town in essex to introduce rules around street charity collection .
the council joins brentwood , chelmsford and southend in signing up to use guidelines set by the public fundraising regulatory association .
collectors in colchester will now only be allowed to stand on high street and culver street three days a week .
author: Jenni Hulse
BBC Essex

documents.title: waltham abbey shooting was 'targeted attack '
text: in the last few minutes , essex police has said a fatal shooting in waltham abbey yesterday was a `` targeted attack '' .
a man in his 30s was shot at outside the marriott hotel in old shire lane at about 09:45 .
det ch insp marina ericson said : `` the assailant appears to have been waiting for the victim in the car park '' .
a post-mortem examination on the man 's body is taking place today .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: tory sparks war of words saying donald trump is 'probably right ' to call for ban on muslims entering america
text: a senior tory councillor sparked a war of words on twitter after suggesting us republican presidential candidate donald trump was probably right '' in his call to ban more muslims from entering america .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: timeline of yesterday 's waltham abbey shooting
text: we 'll be keeping a close eye on any developments in essex police 's investigation into the waltham abbey shooting .
here 's a reminder of events that took place yesterday :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: packed lunch causes bomb scare on bus
text: passengers on a bus in chelmsford had to be evacuated this morning , after a lunch box caused a security alert .
essex police says it was contacted at around 08:10 to reports of a sus package on the number 42 in watchouse road .
after checking the scene , pc alan conran tweeted the rucksack was `` found to contain a packed lunch '' .
the filling of the sandwich is not known .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: walton bungalow explosion : pensioner taken to colchester hospital
text: i have just spoken to the east of england ambulance service about its involvement in last night 's bungalow explosion in walton-on-the-naze .
the service told me a man in his 80s was taken to colchester hospital after his bungalow partially collapsed on elliots drive .
paramedics said the man `` seemed ok '' but might have been exposed to smoke .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: waltham abbey murder : search for gunman continues
text: a gunman remains on the run after a fatal shooting in waltham abbey yesterday morning .
a man believed to be in his 20s `` fled in fear of his life '' after being shot outside the marriott hotel..
he reached a nearby pub car park where he died .
essex police is yet to make any arrests or give details of any suspects , but it says there is no threat to the wider public .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : road closures around waltham abbey
text: a number of closures remain in place this morning following yesterday'sfatal shootingin waltham abbey :
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: explosion causes bungalow to partially collapse
text: a bungalow has partially collapsed in walton-on-the-naze after an explosion .
essex fire and rescue says it was called to elliots drive just before 19:30 last night .
a man in his 80s was treated by paramedics for burns .
the cause of the explosion is not yet known .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : plenty of sunshine this morning but it will be getting cloudier later with winds increasing
text: it will be a fine , dry and chilly morning with plenty of sunshine around .
as we go through the afternoon , cloud amounts will increase and it will turn milder despite the strengthening winds .
maximum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : search continues for gunman and walton bungalow 'explosion '
text: here are the top stories we 're looking at on the news desk this morning :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to wednesday 's live page for essex
text: good morning and welcome to essex live .
until 18:00 we 'll have all the latest news , sport , weather , and travel for the county .
if you would like to get in touch you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
